property.name: CURRENT_PAGE
property.shortdesc: The page on which the index entry is located.

property.name: TO_NEXT_STYLE_CHANGE
property.shortdesc: The range of pages from the page containing the index entry to the page containing the next paragraph style change.

property.name: TO_NEXT_USE_OF_STYLE
property.shortdesc: The range of pages from the page containing the index entry to the page that contains the next occurrance of the specified paragraph style. If no paragraph style is specified, the paragraph style of the index entry paragraph is used.

property.name: TO_END_OF_STORY
property.shortdesc: The last page in the story containing the index entry.

property.name: TO_END_OF_DOCUMENT
property.shortdesc: The last page in the document.

property.name: TO_END_OF_SECTION
property.shortdesc: The last page in the numbered section containing the index entry.

property.name: FOR_NEXT_N_PARAGRAPHS
property.shortdesc: The range of pages from the page containing the index entry to the page containing the nth full paragraph from the paragraph containing the index entry (where n is the number of paragraphs to include).

property.name: FOR_NEXT_N_PAGES
property.shortdesc: The range of pages from the page containing the inedex entry to the nth page after that page (where n is the number of pages to include).

property.name: SUPPRESS_PAGE_NUMBERS
property.shortdesc: Turns off page numbers for the index topic.
